thread.title: Atascadero Women's Clothing Store Kelly's Casuals To Host Fashion Show For Relay For Life Teams
thread.title_full: Atascadero Women's Clothing Store Kelly's Casuals To Host Fashion Show For Relay For Life Teams

author: Scott Brennan
title: Atascadero Women's Clothing Store Kelly's Casuals To Host Fashion Show For Relay For Life Teams
text:
Kelly’s Casuals in Atascadero will raise money for two local Relay for Life teams: Pink Angels and Team Running Babbit on Saturday, Oct. 24 at 5 p.m. at Country Touch Cafe, 8135 El Camino Real, with “ Celebrating Survivors – A Fashion Show .” All the models are breast cancer survivors from the two Relay for Life teams. Kelly’s Casuals owner Kelly Long said that the fashion show will spotlight the inspiring models in fall fashions and accessories carried at the clothing boutique.
“Ladies love fashion shows where they can support their friends and cheer them on,” Long said. “It gives my store a chance highlight what we can do for women of every size, shape and age.”
The boutique will put on a total of 19 fashion shows this year. This fundraising fashion show will include light snacks and beverages. Raffle tickets for door prizes will be sold at the event. To be sure there are enough seats for everyone, call Kelly’s Casuals at (805) 461-1800 to make a reservation.
“I’m very passionate about breast cancer awareness, my wonderful customers, my store and doing business in Atascadero,” Long said.
Long has been dressing women in San Luis Obispo County for more than 30 years and opened her Atascadero boutique seven years ago.
“I love what I do and I think my enthusiasm of helping ladies feel good about themselves and putting them in clothes that truly fit them well makes them feel confident and beautiful,” Long said.
Long carries manufacturers such as Tribal, French Dressing Jeans, Sienna Rose blouses, Erin London, Suko Jeans, Ethyl/Euro Denim, Jess N Jane and Cactus in her boutique, as well as Purses, jewelry, scarves, locally made jewelry and gifts.
“Kelly’s Casuals is the ideal women’s clothing store ideal for fashionistas who require the latest styles, but appreciate having something off-beat and original,” Long said. “Our mission is to bring quality designer fashion to the women of Atascadero.”
The Atascadero Relay for Life will be held Saturday, April 16 to Sunday, April 17 in Sunken Gardens. Kelly’s Casuals recently had a booth at Atascadero’s Colony Days on Saturday, Oct. 17. The company was recently featured in the A-Town Daily News , the newspaper of Atascadero, CA.
Kelly’s Casuals is located at 8125 El Camino Real. For more information, go to http://www.kellyscasuals.com or call 805-461-1800. The boutique is open Monday through Saturday from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. and is closed on Sunday.
Kelly’s Casuals
8125 El Camino Real
Atascadero, CA 93422
(805) 461-1800
